Text.Page:
The devas in Deva Silva are plotting against us and must be stopped. How do I know? Intel, soldier. And that's all you need to know.

You are to kill {@LinkCreature:3#300141#devan blademasters}, {@LinkCreature:3#18#devan scrappers}, {@LinkCreature:3#300160#devan arcanists}, {@LinkCreature:3#14#reavers of resurrection} and {@LinkCreature:3#15#ebonheart sorcerers}.

Report to Malvina at Vanguard Outpost when you're done.
Good work, soldier. The federation needs more <PCCLASS:lcase>s like you.
You haven't completed your mission yet. Did you not pay attention to your orders?
